thread.title: Indianapolis Colts vs. Houston Texans: Thursday Night Football live updates, score, game chat
thread.title_full: Indianapolis Colts vs. Houston Texans: Thursday Night Football live updates, score, game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Tim Brown | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Indianapolis Colts vs. Houston Texans: Thursday Night Football live updates, score, game chat
text:
The Indianapolis Colts have kicked off in Week 5 of the 2015 NFL season against JJ Watt and the Houston Texans . In case you can't make it to a TV, be sure to follow along with live updates below. (TV on CBS, Comcast channel 706).
More : TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how the Colts or Texans are performing? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
